title: "The UTAH" sign, San Francisco
content:
Can somebody help me id this? Thanks in advance!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414175827im_/http:/typophile.com/files/theutah_4456.JPG)
author: Glen

comments.content:
This is a nice piece of sign painting, done by hand, not from a typeface, and I have admired it many times on my way back to the East Bay on I-80. You can find similar forms in [Boston Truckstyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414175827/http:/letterheadfonts.com/fonts/bostontruckstyle.shtml).

For the "the" script, have a look at [Ballantines](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414175827/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner_flake/ballantines_script_1_ot/) and [ITC Edwardian Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414175827/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_edwardian_script_bold_alternate/).
